item.title: Rocket Chat Files download [python]
item.description: import json import requests from pathlib import Path """ ╭──────────────────────────────────────────────╮ │ ◎ ○ ○ ░░░░░░░░░░░░ Usage ░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░│ ├──────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ │ │ This gist is to download all the files from │ │ the Rocket Chat chat-history. │ │ │ │ Only modify the following when needed: │ │ │ │ │ │ baseUrl; │ │desPath(where you want to download files to); │ │ chatPath(where are the chat files); │ │ X-Auth-Token; │ │ X-User-Id.
